t_charger_setting Struct Reference


Data Fields

t_batt_charger chgr
bool on
unsigned char c_voltage
unsigned char c_current

Detailed Description

This structure is used for the following battery changer control IOCTLs:
  • PMIC_BATT_CHARGER_CONTROL
  • PMIC_BATT_SET_CHARGER
  • PMIC_BATT_GET_CHARGER

Field Documentation

unsigned char c_current

Charging current

unsigned char c_voltage

Charging voltage

t_batt_charger chgr

Charger

bool on

Turn on charger
